item.title: Israeli Forces Kill 2 Palestinian Militants Wanted for Deadly Attack
item.description: The men were affiliated with a militant group, Palestinian Islamic Jihad, which carried out an attack earlier this month, the military said.

item.title: OpenAI Unveils New Agent Tool ‘Operator’
item.description: The new tool, called Operator, can shop for groceries or book a restaurant reservation. But it still needs help from humans.

item.title: 2025 Oscar Nominations: See the Full List
item.description: The movies competing for the 97th Academy Awards. The ceremony will air on March 2.
